China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ 2024 年 1 月 8 日星期一 09:38:12 GMT 120
China to conduct live firing drills in East China Sea on Jan 8-9China will conduct live firing drills in some areas in the East China Sea from 10 a.m. (0200 GMT) to 3 p.m. on Monday and Tuesday, according to the China maritime safety administration. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 08:35:45 GMT 7Y4A4TFDVZPYTCIHT5JKXBW6HQ https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-conduct-live-firing-drills-east-china-sea-jan-8-9-2024-01-08/Reuters世界中国
Nvidia to launch China-focused AI chip in Q2 2024 - sourcesU.S. chipmaker Nvidia plans to begin mass production in the second quarter of 2024 of an artificial intelligence (AI) chip it designed for China to comply with U.S. export rules, two people familiar with the matter said on Monday. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 07:44:44 GMT 6UI3WL7GNJKJPAU45WXT4J3USI https://www.reuters.com/technology/nvidia-launch-china-focused-ai-chip-q2-2024-sources-2024-01-08/Yelin Mo, Fanny Potkin技术被破坏
Geely's Zeekr aims to double its EV deliveries in 2024Zeekr is aiming to deliver 230,000 cars in 2024, double its deliveries in 2023, a company spokesperson said on Monday, as the electric car brand of China's Geely (GEELY.UL) ramps up sales of new models and expand into overseas markets. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 06:55:44 GMT S3VMFOHNZRJ3ZF5FJL3V2TVDLA https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/geelys-zeekr-aims-sell-230000-evs-2024-double-2023-deliveries-2024-01-08/Reuters商业带电
Exclusive: China regulators lift stock net-selling ban for mutual fundsChina's securities regulator is allowing mutual fund managers to sell more shares than they buy each day, three sources said, removing a ban introduced late last year aimed at propping up a flagging stock market. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 06:12:51 GMT JIMQVR2ADNM77CFKBM5SCFJGU4 https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-regulators-lift-stock-net- sell-ban-mutual-funds-sources-2024-01-08/Reuters世界中国
What aerospace analysts are saying about Boeing's mid-air blowoutA serious mid-air breach has landed planemaker Boeing in the regulatory crosshairs just as it was awaiting approval of new models of its best-selling MAX jet. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 04:14:33 GMT O26ZDWL3SJJINFQGA3AW6BAUC4 https://www.reuters.com/business/aerospace-defense/what-aerospace-analysts-are-saying-about-boeings-mid-air-blowout-2024-01-08/Reuters商业航空航天与国防
Ignoring Taiwan's complaints, more Chinese balloons spotted over straitTaiwan's defence ministry said it detected three more Chinese balloons flying over the Taiwan Strait on Sunday, one of which crossed the island, the latest in a spate of such balloons the ministry says it has spotted over the past month. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 02:44:36 GMT MZVGLYUCP5IUDGULHDJMI7QKMA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/ignoring-taiwans-complaints-more-chinese-balloons-spotted-over-strait-2024-01-08/Reuters世界亚太地区
